summary: A comprehensive test suite for Qiskit’s visualization components, covering circuit rendering (graphical, LaTeX, and text), DAG diagrams, device gate maps, pass‑manager flowcharts, histogram plotting, state‑vector and unitary LaTeX output, and supporting helper utilities. The tests verify default and custom back‑ends, output formats, styling options, error handling, and compare generated images against reference files.
business_intent: Ensure the correctness, consistency, and regression safety of Qiskit’s visualisation features so that developers and end‑users receive accurate and reliable graphical representations of quantum circuits and results.
